TopicTitle: Can somebody create a spacesuit for me?

Articles.Content:
My GIMP/Photoshop skills are very bad and as such I am requesting any person who knows how to retexture spacesuits properly (for TextureReplacer) to create the following suit for me:

 

- It should include both an IVA and EVA texture as well as a helmet

- The main color shall be dark green

- The standard KSP decal should be replaced with the following flag:

http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/spore/images/a/ab/MDFFlag1.png/revision/latest?cb=20160416190504

 

Thank you very much. If you make me such a suit please send me a PM with the download link!
